entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
